languages.text: "Перейдем к Тассере. Этот мир недоплатил положенное количество десятины, кое преступление должно было исправить Вольному Торговцу, сопроводив проктора Антара на этот отсталый мир. Проктор, вы вызываетесь для дачи показаний. Опишите, что произошло на планете".

"Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."
languages.original_text: "Перейдем к Тассере. Этот мир недоплатил положенное количество десятины, кое преступление должно было исправить Вольному Торговцу, сопроводив проктора Антара на этот отсталый мир. Проктор, вы вызываетесь для дачи показаний. Опишите, что произошло на планете".

traits.locale_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

"Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

"Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

"Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

"Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

languages.text: "Kommen wir nun zu Thassera. Diese Welt hat den Zehnt nicht vollumfänglich entrichtet, ein Verbrechen, das durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hätte gesühnt werden müssen, {mf|der|die} Proktor Anthar in diese abgelegene Welt begleitet hat. Proktor, Ihr werdet hiermit als Zeuge aufgerufen. Beschreibt, was auf dem Planeten passiert ist."
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Kommen wir nun zu Thassera. Diese Welt hat den Zehnt nicht vollumfänglich entrichtet, ein Verbrechen, das durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hätte gesühnt werden müssen, {mf|der|die} Proktor Anthar in diese abgelegene Welt begleitet hat. Proktor, Ihr werdet hiermit als Zeuge aufgerufen. Beschreibt, was auf dem Planeten passiert ist."

languages.text: « Parlons maintenant de Thassera. Ce monde a versé une dîme insuffisante, un crime qui aurait dû être puni par {mf|le libre-marchand chargé|la libre-marchande chargée} d'escorter le proctor Anthar sur place. Proctor, veuillez vous présenter à la barre. Décrivez-nous les événements survenus sur cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: « Parlons maintenant de Thassera. Ce monde a versé une dîme insuffisante, un crime qui aurait dû être puni par {mf|le libre-marchand chargé|la libre-marchande chargée} d'escorter le proctor Anthar sur place. Proctor, veuillez vous présenter à la barre. Décrivez-nous les événements survenus sur cette planète. »

languages.text: “接下来，我们来看看塔瑟拉发生的事情吧。这个世界欠缴了部分什一税，这样的差错本该由安萨监察官在行商浪人的护送下，前往那个落后的世界进行纠正。安萨监察官，我在此传唤你出庭作证，给我们描述一下那颗行星上发生了什么事情吧。”
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: “接下来，我们来看看塔瑟拉发生的事情吧。这个世界欠缴了部分什一税，这样的差错本该由安萨监察官在行商浪人的护送下，前往那个落后的世界进行纠正。安萨监察官，我在此传唤你出庭作证，给我们描述一下那颗行星上发生了什么事情吧。”

languages.text: «Continuemos con Thassera. Este mundo faltó a su deber con una contribución insuficiente al diezmo, delito que debería haberse solucionado con la visita de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y el Procurador Anthar al mundo. Procurador, queda llamado a testificar. Describa los hechos que se desarrollaron en el planeta».
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: «Continuemos con Thassera. Este mundo faltó a su deber con una contribución insuficiente al diezmo, delito que debería haberse solucionado con la visita de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y el Procurador Anthar al mundo. Procurador, queda llamado a testificar. Describa los hechos que se desarrollaron en el planeta».

languages.text: 「次にタッセーラの件に移りましょう。当該惑星は適正な租税を支払わなかった罪があり、それはローグトレーダーがアンサール代理人を護衛してこの後進惑星へ赴くことで是正されるべきでした。代理人をここに召喚します。惑星で何が起こったのかを証言してください」
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: 「次にタッセーラの件に移りましょう。当該惑星は適正な租税を支払わなかった罪があり、それはローグトレーダーがアンサール代理人を護衛してこの後進惑星へ赴くことで是正されるべきでした。代理人をここに召喚します。惑星で何が起こったのかを証言してください」

languages.text: "Thassera'ya geçelim. Bu dünya, uygun görülen aşar miktarını ödememiştir. Bu ayıbın telafisi de Üsteğmen Anthar'ı o ilkel dünyaya götüren Hür Tacir'e düşmektedir. İfadeye buyurun Üsteğmen... O gezegende olanları anlatın."
languages.original_text: "Let's move on to Thassera. This world underpaid the appropriate tithe amount, a crime that should have been remedied by the Rogue Trader escorting Proctor Anthar to that backward world. Proctor, you are hereby called to testify. Describe what happened on the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'ya geçelim. Bu dünya, uygun görülen aşar miktarını ödememiştir. Bu ayıbın telafisi de Üsteğmen Anthar'ı o ilkel dünyaya götüren Hür Tacir'e düşmektedir. İfadeye buyurun Üsteğmen... O gezegende olanları anlatın."
